# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal to Provide Accommodation for the Department of National Defence

**Tender Details**

* **Title**: Accommodation in Ridgecrest, California
* **Reference Number**: WS4552724325-Doc4563597043
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4552724325
* **Publication Date**: April 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024 at 14:00 EDT
* **Revision Date**: May 9, 2024

**Project Overview**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified offerors to provide accommodation services for the period of June 10, 2024 to March 1, 2025. The selected offeror will be responsible for providing a hotel(s) located within a 15-mile drive of 1 Administrative Circle, Ridgecrest, California 93555.

**Key Requirements**

* Provide accommodation services for the specified period
* Ensure the hotel(s) is located within a 15-mile drive of the designated location
* Meet the requirements of the Department of National Defence (DND)

**Evaluation Criteria**

* The lowest price will be the determining factor in the evaluation process

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Method**

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Contact Information**

* Martine Hunter (Department of Public Works and Government Services)
* Email: [martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: Phone, Fax, and Address information are not provided.

**Notice URL**

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19565093?extsite=MTk1NjUwOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this project has been amended to disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by May 15, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.  The selected contractor will be responsible for providing accommodation services within the specified criteria.  The lowest price will be the determining factor in the evaluation process. 

Best regards to the technical writer and the contractor for the efficient handoff to you
